cn.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove
• The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps
• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

cn.description:
Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass).

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords
2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style
3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key!
4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create
5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster.

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from.

Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at www.sessionbandapp.com

Get some of the world's best jazz musicians playing on your tracks:

• Jason Rebello (Piano): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel...

• Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford's Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown...

cn.description:
彩云天气Pro(无广告版）是基于气象雷达图，利用人工智能算法进行分钟级降水预报的全球先驱者。
「分钟级降水预报」
两小时内超准的分钟级降水预报，及时调整自己和家人的出行计划。
「全方位天气提醒」
无论是你的当前位置，还是收藏的地址，降水时间、预警信息、天气早晚报都支持自定义订阅！
「全球气象雷达动图」
700部气象雷达构建的AI预报网络，让你随时随刻都能看到实时的降水动态。
「全国空气质量动图」
凉风起天末，雾霾意如何？等风来的闲暇时光，不如看看雾霾的走势。
「台风实时追踪」
每个台风都有一个美丽的名字，年年来此，却上演着不同的故事：强度、路径、生命史……
「街道级定位」
都说气象万千，那每条街道、小区也值得专属的天气预报！
「我要反馈天气」
预报错了就来吐槽！狠狠戳下反馈天气，帮助改进人工智能预报模型，一起来提高预报准确率！

5. 隐私协议: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/privacy.html
6. 用户协议: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/vipprotocal.html

cn.description:
这个App可以让你更专注地工作或学习，戒掉手机瘾，让你在工作或学习的时候远离手机，提高工作和学习的效率。

当开启了不玩手机警报后，你在设定的时间里拿起手机将会报警，这将培养你更专注于学习或工作的习惯。

App使用方法：
1. 选择要集中精力工作的时间间隔。

2. 把手机放在水平桌面上。

3. 点击开始按钮。

4. 直接按下锁定屏幕按钮。

5. 开始并专注于你的工作或学习。
快来和我们一起进步吧！！！

hk.description:
Create studio-quality soul, jazz and funk tracks to your own chords in minutes with the latest edition of the award-winning SessionBand app – the world’s only chord-based loop app.

Featuring exclusive royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Keyboards); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). 

Volume 3 is the ultimate soul jazz funk play-along and the perfect tool for songwriters. Here's what you get:

• 15 chord variations per root note in every style! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic soul jazz chords
• 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style
• Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create
• New tech enhancements like ‘Track Builder’ to make the workflow even faster

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

This latest edition contains a diverse spread of 8 soul jazz funk styles from a Herbie
Hancock slow burn, laid-back 70's funk groove all the way through to an exciting, uptempo neo-latin jazz rock groove in 7/4. You can check out samples of all the styles at www.sessionbandapp.com/sessionband-soul-jazz-funk-3-music-app-create-backing-tracks/

SessionBand Soul Jazz Funk 3 is a professional app – essential for anyone learning jazz music and perfect for soul jazz funk musicians looking for the ultimate play-along. But equally, it’s simple enough for non-musicians who love music to create their own great sounding, copyright-free soul jazz funk music and share it with the world – even if they don’t play a note!

Create professional soul jazz funk tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality tracks:

• Pick one of 8 soul jazz funk styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix
• Change tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create…instantly
• ‘Flip’ your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

Get the world’s best musicians playing on your tracks:

• Jason Rebello (Keyboards): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel…
• Jeremy Stacey (Drums): Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds; King Crimson; Amy Winehouse; Take That; Eric Clapton…
• Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford’s Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown…
• Geoff Gascoyne (Bass); Sting; Van Morrison; Guy Barker; Georgie Fame…

You don’t have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Info:

• 4,320 chord-based multi channel loop stacks (Over 15,000 individual loops)
• 8 diverse soul jazz funk styles: Laid-Back Funk; 70’s Funk; Swing Beat; Rare Groove; Latin Groove; Broken Beat; Jazz Rock; Groove In Seven 
• Tempos from 60bpm to 220bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove

The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps.

All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works.

ClashX can effectively increase your productivity to manage server.

- Delay test
- Manage Server
- Status monitor
- Switch proxy
- Query log
- Config Modify
- Policy Group
- Support Provider Proxy

hk.description:
《帕夏星球：重生》是台灣獨立遊戲團隊——藍蠍遊戲的初試啼聲之作。獨樹一格的療癒手繪場景、輕鬆的推理風格、圍繞著日常展開的遊戲主線，都將帶給玩家不同於以往的沉浸式解謎體驗。

【遊戲概要】
故事發生在遙遠的帕夏星。那裡有座位於地底的繁榮城市，住著一群可愛的汪星人。他們過著日復一日的和平生活，享受著科技帶來的便利。然而，從小在城中長大的主角波比卻時常幻想著走出封閉的地下城，去看看外頭的世界。而遊戲主線正是由此展開的。玩家將會化身波比，在看似平靜安逸，實際上卻面臨能源耗竭危機的城市裡探索，透過挑戰層層關卡，解開最終謎團，在災難來臨前找出拯救所有居民的方法！

【遊戲特色】
- 台灣獨立遊戲團隊打造
- 經典點擊解謎玩法
- 可愛療癒的手繪場景
- 燒腦的解謎關卡

hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

三秒記一筆！快速、安全、好用是我們的宗旨，更有 iOS 通知中心的Widget插件。

看看其他人怎麼說：
◎ 我本身係個要求高的人，但這個真的不錯！

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

hk.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！

hk.description:
在終極駕駛遊樂場中燃燒橡膠並撕碎金屬！

Wreckfest 充滿了升級和自定義選項。無論您是準備使用加固保險槓、防滾架、側面保護裝置等進行下一次拆遷德比，還是使用空氣濾清器、凸輪軸、燃油系統等發動機性能部件為您的汽車進行一場激烈的比賽，Wreckfest 正在成為最好的競技賽車遊戲。

• 獨特的賽車體驗 –只有通過逼真的物理模擬才能實現。見證在高速賽道上瘋狂的並駕齊驅，在充滿交叉路口和迎面而來的車輛的瘋狂賽道上面臨徹底的破壞瘋狂，或者在德比賽場上大獲全勝。

• 很棒的汽車—— 我們的汽車很舊，被撞壞了，被拼湊在一起......他們散發出風格和個性！從老美國重擊手到敏捷的歐洲人和有趣的亞洲人，你在其他遊戲中找不到這樣的東西。

• 有意義的定制 – 不僅可以改變汽車的外觀，還可以升級它們的防彈衣 – 用重鐵加固它們保護您免受損壞，但也會增加重量，這會影響汽車的操控性。修改您的汽車，以製造堅固的坦克或易碎但閃電般快速的火箭，或介於兩者之間的任何東西！

• 多人遊戲 - 在本地多人遊戲中破壞你的朋友，在追逐爆破優勢的同時將賽車推向極限！

• 挑戰模式 - 與農作物收割機、割草機、校車、三輪車等等一起玩得開心！

• 職業生涯模式 – 爭奪冠軍，賺取經驗，解鎖新的升級和車輛，並成為歷史上的 Wreckfest 冠軍！

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！

mo.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove
• The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps
• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

mo.description:
Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass).

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords
2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style
3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key!
4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create
5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster.

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from.

mo.description:
《帕夏星球：重生》是台灣獨立遊戲團隊——藍蠍遊戲的初試啼聲之作。獨樹一格的療癒手繪場景、輕鬆的推理風格、圍繞著日常展開的遊戲主線，都將帶給玩家不同於以往的沉浸式解謎體驗。

【遊戲概要】
故事發生在遙遠的帕夏星。那裡有座位於地底的繁榮城市，住著一群可愛的汪星人。他們過著日復一日的和平生活，享受著科技帶來的便利。然而，從小在城中長大的主角波比卻時常幻想著走出封閉的地下城，去看看外頭的世界。而遊戲主線正是由此展開的。玩家將會化身波比，在看似平靜安逸，實際上卻面臨能源耗竭危機的城市裡探索，透過挑戰層層關卡，解開最終謎團，在災難來臨前找出拯救所有居民的方法！

【遊戲特色】
- 台灣獨立遊戲團隊打造
- 經典點擊解謎玩法
- 可愛療癒的手繪場景
- 燒腦的解謎關卡

你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

mo.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

mo.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！

將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

mo.description:
在終極駕駛遊樂場中燃燒橡膠並撕碎金屬！

Wreckfest 充滿了升級和自定義選項。無論您是準備使用加固保險槓、防滾架、側面保護裝置等進行下一次拆遷德比，還是使用空氣濾清器、凸輪軸、燃油系統等發動機性能部件為您的汽車進行一場激烈的比賽，Wreckfest 正在成為最好的競技賽車遊戲。

• 獨特的賽車體驗 –只有通過逼真的物理模擬才能實現。見證在高速賽道上瘋狂的並駕齊驅，在充滿交叉路口和迎面而來的車輛的瘋狂賽道上面臨徹底的破壞瘋狂，或者在德比賽場上大獲全勝。

• 很棒的汽車—— 我們的汽車很舊，被撞壞了，被拼湊在一起......他們散發出風格和個性！從老美國重擊手到敏捷的歐洲人和有趣的亞洲人，你在其他遊戲中找不到這樣的東西。

• 有意義的定制 – 不僅可以改變汽車的外觀，還可以升級它們的防彈衣 – 用重鐵加固它們保護您免受損壞，但也會增加重量，這會影響汽車的操控性。修改您的汽車，以製造堅固的坦克或易碎但閃電般快速的火箭，或介於兩者之間的任何東西！

• 多人遊戲 - 在本地多人遊戲中破壞你的朋友，在追逐爆破優勢的同時將賽車推向極限！

• 挑戰模式 - 與農作物收割機、割草機、校車、三輪車等等一起玩得開心！

• 職業生涯模式 – 爭奪冠軍，賺取經驗，解鎖新的升級和車輛，並成為歷史上的 Wreckfest 冠軍！

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

tw.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove
• The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps
• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove

The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps.

All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works.

ClashX can effectively increase your productivity to manage server.

- Delay test
- Manage Server
- Status monitor
- Switch proxy
- Query log
- Config Modify
- Policy Group
- Support Provider Proxy

tw.description:
《帕夏星球：重生》是台灣獨立遊戲團隊——藍蠍遊戲的初試啼聲之作。獨樹一格的療癒手繪場景、輕鬆的推理風格、圍繞著日常展開的遊戲主線，都將帶給玩家不同於以往的沉浸式解謎體驗。

【遊戲概要】
故事發生在遙遠的帕夏星。那裡有座位於地底的繁榮城市，住著一群可愛的汪星人。他們過著日復一日的和平生活，享受著科技帶來的便利。然而，從小在城中長大的主角波比卻時常幻想著走出封閉的地下城，去看看外頭的世界。而遊戲主線正是由此展開的。玩家將會化身波比，在看似平靜安逸，實際上卻面臨能源耗竭危機的城市裡探索，透過挑戰層層關卡，解開最終謎團，在災難來臨前找出拯救所有居民的方法！

【遊戲特色】
- 台灣獨立遊戲團隊打造
- 經典點擊解謎玩法
- 可愛療癒的手繪場景
- 燒腦的解謎關卡

tw.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

三秒記一筆！快速、安全、好用是我們的宗旨，更有 iOS 通知中心的Widget插件。

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。

任務簡報

tw.description:
在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集
- 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！
- 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲
- 照顧好羊羣
- 飼養甜美的小羔羊
- 積極和羊羣玩耍
- 給牠們提供許多不同的物品
- 種植並收割不同的資源
- 剪羊毛
- 自定義農場
- 控制天氣
- 日夜循環
- 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定
- 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣
- 支持MFi遊戲手柄
- 支持Game Center

tw.description:
將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！

特色

- 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務

tw.description:
在終極駕駛遊樂場中燃燒橡膠並撕碎金屬！

Wreckfest 充滿了升級和自定義選項。無論您是準備使用加固保險槓、防滾架、側面保護裝置等進行下一次拆遷德比，還是使用空氣濾清器、凸輪軸、燃油系統等發動機性能部件為您的汽車進行一場激烈的比賽，Wreckfest 正在成為最好的競技賽車遊戲。

• 獨特的賽車體驗 –只有通過逼真的物理模擬才能實現。見證在高速賽道上瘋狂的並駕齊驅，在充滿交叉路口和迎面而來的車輛的瘋狂賽道上面臨徹底的破壞瘋狂，或者在德比賽場上大獲全勝。

• 很棒的汽車—— 我們的汽車很舊，被撞壞了，被拼湊在一起......他們散發出風格和個性！從老美國重擊手到敏捷的歐洲人和有趣的亞洲人，你在其他遊戲中找不到這樣的東西。

• 有意義的定制 – 不僅可以改變汽車的外觀，還可以升級它們的防彈衣 – 用重鐵加固它們保護您免受損壞，但也會增加重量，這會影響汽車的操控性。修改您的汽車，以製造堅固的坦克或易碎但閃電般快速的火箭，或介於兩者之間的任何東西！

• 多人遊戲 - 在本地多人遊戲中破壞你的朋友，在追逐爆破優勢的同時將賽車推向極限！

• 挑戰模式 - 與農作物收割機、割草機、校車、三輪車等等一起玩得開心！

• 職業生涯模式 – 爭奪冠軍，賺取經驗，解鎖新的升級和車輛，並成為歷史上的 Wreckfest 冠軍！

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

us.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove
• The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps
• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

us.description:
Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass).

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords
2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style
3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key!
4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create
5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster.

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from.

“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

us.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

us.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock
- Raise sweet little lambs
- Actively play with your animals
- Give them many different items and objects

us.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

us.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

us.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
us.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

tr.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

tr.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX

tr.description:
“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

tr.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

tr.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock

tr.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

tr.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords.

tr.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
tr.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

tr.description:
This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

pt.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove
• The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps
• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

pt.description:
Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass).

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords

3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key!

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from.

Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks.

两小时内超准的分钟级降水预报，及时调整自己和家人的出行计划。

无论是你的当前位置，还是收藏的地址，降水时间、预警信息、天气早晚报都支持自定义订阅！

700部气象雷达构建的AI预报网络，让你随时随刻都能看到实时的降水动态。

凉风起天末，雾霾意如何？等风来的闲暇时光，不如看看雾霾的走势。

每个台风都有一个美丽的名字，年年来此，却上演着不同的故事：强度、路径、生命史……

都说气象万千，那每条街道、小区也值得专属的天气预报！

预报错了就来吐槽！狠狠戳下反馈天气，帮助改进人工智能预报模型，一起来提高预报准确率！

pt.description:
“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

pt.description:
Acordas sozinho numa estranha ilha cheia de quebra-cabeças que te irão desafiar e surpreender.

Não tens memória de quem és nem de como vieste aqui parar, mas só há uma coisa que podes fazer: explorar a ilha na esperança de descobrir pistas, recuperar a memória e, de alguma forma, encontrar uma maneira de regressar a casa.

The Witness é um jogo para um só jogador e passa-se num mundo aberto com dezenas de locais para explorares e mais de 500 quebra-cabeças. Este jogo respeita-te enquanto jogador inteligente e considera que o teu tempo é precioso. Nada é supérfluo – cada um destes quebra-cabeças introduz a sua própria ideia nova. Assim, este é um jogo cheio de ideias.

LUTE num frio de gelar os ossos no fronte leste de 1941!

pt.description:
O bando fofinho que todos adoram está de volta - e mais animados que nunca!

Nesta esperada sequência do jogo “Clouds & Sheep”, as ovelhinhas fofas finalmente estão à solta de novo! Resolva inúmeras missões e atenda às necessidades dos amiguinhos lanudos. Plante pasto, flores, árvores e tosquie a lã de várias cores dos animais para abastecer seus recursos! Colete estrelas felizes, colha madeira e pétalas de flores e use-as para fornecer comida, acessórios, brinquedos e muito mais ao seu bando! Controle as nuvens e faça chover para que suas ovelhas nunca fiquem sem água fresca para beber! Se as ovelhas estiverem felizes e satisfeitas, elas logo terão pequenos cordeirinhos!

Todos os animais precisam da sua atenção! As bolinhas de lã gostam de se divertir. Faça sua ovelha pular e use brinquedos diferentes como a cama elástica, a gangorra e o balanço para brincar com eles! Veja seus bichinhos interagirem entre si e observe as reações deles aos objetos que você lhes dá! Personalize a pastagem do bando com objetos divertidos e escolha entre diversos cenários como Velho Oeste ou Piratas. Veja seu bando correr por aí o dia todo e dormir junto à fogueira de noite. Faça tudo o que puder para manter as ovelhas felizes para evitar que se tornem grandes nuvens de algodão no céu.

Recursos:
- Jogue sem anúncios!
- A incrível continuação do jogo de sucesso “Clouds & Sheep”
- Comece uma aventura épica para encontrar a lendária Fonte da Juventude!
- Jogo de simulação com adoráveis ovelhas
- Cuide bem do seu bando
- Crie lindos e belos cordeirinhos
- Brinque com seus animais
- Dê a eles vários itens e objetos
- Cultive e colha diversos recursos
- Tosquie suas ovelhas
- Personalize sua pastagem
- Controle o clima
- Ciclo de dia e noite
- Jogo de mundo aberto em 3D
- Adequado para crianças e divertido para toda a família
- Compatível comcontrole MFi!
- Compatível com Game Center!

pt.description:
Transforme seu pequeno vilarejo em um enorme império medieval com uma economia em expansão e habitantes felizes! Encontre locais para mineração, cultive plantações em suas fazendas e colete moedas com os impostos sobre a população. Construa campos de combate, tavernas, mercados e embeleze a cidade com estátuas impressionantes, monumentos magníficos e jardins vicejantes. Mas também há perigos à espreita. Os bandidos estão na área, esperando para saquear e pilhar sua cidade pacífica. Construa um quartel para recrutar bravos soldados e torres de guarda para proteger seus cidadãos do perigo. Você administra todo o império do seu castelo, fazendo de tudo que para que os habitantes divirtam-se e sejam felizes!

pt.description:
Queime borracha e destrua metal no maior circuito de corrida livre que há!

Wreckfest possui uma paulada de opções de melhorias e personalizações. Você pode se preparar para a próxima corrida de demolição com para-choques reforçados, santantônios, protetores laterais e muito mais, ou pode preparar o carro para uma Corrida Lata Velha com peças de desempenho de motor como filtros de ar, árvores de cames, sistemas de combustível etc. Wreckfest está se tornando o melhor jogo de combate motorizado que existe. 

• Experiência de Corrida Única - Corridas de ação sem regras e de tirar o fôlego, com momentos únicos possíveis apenas graças à simulação física realista. Participe de batalhas em circuitos de alta velocidade, enfrente a possibilidade de destruição total em rotas malucas com intersecções e tráfego ou parta para a dominação nas arenas de destruição.

• Carros Incríveis - Nossos carros são velhos, acabados e remendados, mas cheios de estilo! Dos velhos guerreiros americanos aos ágeis europeus, passando pelos asiáticos divertidos! Não tem nada como isso em outros jogos. 

• Personalização Relevante - Altere não só a aparência do carro, mas também a blindagem. Reforce-os com placas de ferro pesadas que protegem contra dano, mas aumentam o peso, impactando o controle. Modifique o carro para que se torne um tanque robusto, um foguete frágil e veloz ou qualquer coisa entre esses extremos!

pt.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

pt.description:
Halls of Torment é um jogo de sobrevivência contra hordas com um visual retrô pré-renderizado, reminiscente dos RPGs dos anos 90. Escolha um dos muitos personagens heróis e desça aos Mortais Salões da Tormenta. Lute contra horrores profanos do além e sobreviva a onda após onda de inimigos até enfrentar um dos Senhores atormentados.

Fortaleça seu herói com características, habilidades e itens. Crie uma nova construção poderosa a cada partida. Explore diversas expansões subterrâneas e encontre novos itens poderosos que permitem aventurar-se ainda mais no abismo.

Primeiramente disponível no Steam, o roguelike RPG de sobrevivência estilo anos 90, Halls of Torment, agora faz sua estreia no mobile!

【Características】
◆ Corridas rápidas e casuais de 30 minutos
◆ Estilo de arte pré-renderizado à moda antiga
◆ Progressão meta baseada em missões
◆ Grande seleção de habilidades, características e itens diversos, permitindo criar sinergias interessantes
◆ Chefes diversos com mecânicas e padrões de ataque únicos
◆ Vários personagens distintos que permitem diferentes estilos de jogo
◆ Desbloqueie e explore vários mundos subterrâneos interessantes e desafiadores
◆ Itens únicos podem ser enviados para o mundo superior e usados para personalizar futuras partidas
◆ Crie tinturas mágicas para direcionar o destino a seu favor
◆ Desbloqueie o poder de cada classe e combine-os com o personagem escolhido
◆ Encontre variantes raras de itens para melhorar ainda mais suas construções

【Lista Completa de Conteúdo】
◆ 6 níveis com ambientes únicos

◆ 25 bênçãos para te fortalecer em cada partida

◆ 1000+ aptidões que melhoram personagens e habilidades

Nossa lista de conteúdo ainda está crescendo, espere mais no futuro!
